website_summaries.verdict: A premium organic mouthwash that delivers a great combination of affordability and quality.
pros: Consists of a distinct mixture of food-grade peroxide, water, organic oregano oil, organic tea tree oil, and organic peppermint oil
Helps treat gum disease, inflammation, and bleeding
Removes stain buildup on the teeth
cons: Not as strong as other organic mouthwashes

customer_reviews.title: Great natural mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product since it contains food grade hydrogen peroxide, and is not tested on animals, but on friends and neighbors. It has a subtle yet refreshing minty taste, and I have noticed that it seems to have reduced any gum inflammation that I had before. It is somewhat expensive for a mouthwash, but I must say, it is worth it. It is best to order 3 or more bottles at a time, to get the best price. I hope that as this company has success, that they will continually lower the price more, and that way more customers can enjoy it. I advise you to try it, as I am sure you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I really felt my receding gum line was improving with ...
customer_reviews.text: I really felt my receding gum line was improving with the mouthwash and toothpaste. As soon as I stopped using it the pain in my gums came back and my gums were reverting back, so I'm going to buy more and see if it helps. It's a small bottle and doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Criola

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A cap full from the bottle should suffice, it did for me. It doesn’t feel as abrasive as chemically filled mouthwash, but you can still “feel” it working. The after taste isn’t the best but that dissipates fairly quickly. It’s such a minor thing and it’s worth it since this is all organic!
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: love this mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: love this mouth wash. gum disease and tooth decay are hereditary in my family. i have been following the fluoride trend for my whole life and yet it always seemed to land me back in the dentist office more often than not. I have been through one container of this mouthwash along with the original tooth paste and have seen noticeable improvements in teeth regeneration, whiting, breath, and my gums are less swollen and lighter pink. i i use the tooth paste twice a day and one cap full of the mouth wash three times a day along with flossing once a day. love it and cannot wait to see further improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Breedowler34

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for a couple of days so I can't attest to its long-term effects, but so far I love it. The company was wonderful to deal with - my order arrived quickly, was packaged well to insure no leakage, and even came with a sample of their toothpaste. I love that the mouthwash is organic and does not contain things I'm trying to avoid (gluten, fluoride, and other nasty chemicals). It seems like it's really good for your mouth and the taste is pleasant - not too strong. Yes, it's pricey, but you don't use that much at a time and it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was thinking it was small when I got it. But it goes a long way and has helped my teeth so much. I will only use this from now on. As long as they don't change how they make it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mouthwash! It makes my mouth feel so clean and I've noticed improvement with my gums in a short period of time. I haven't had any bleeding gums since I started using this. It leaves your mouth feeling clean and fresh without an overpowering taste. It's got a great blend of ingredients too!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria E.

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Freshened my breath but didn't whiten my teeth. I thought it was a little pricey. I'll buy Tom's next time.
customer_reviews.author: R. SineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Favorite non-toxic mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier to be using this mouthwash! This is non-toxic and so much better than the brand names out there! Will be repurchasing this for me and my family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good mouth rinse
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and good for your teeth. It has a minty flavor with the consistency of plain water. Keeps your mouth feeling fresh most of the day. The hydrogen peroxide whitens your teeth and kills the bacteria.Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: PLUS WHITENING is a separate item
customer_reviews.text: The "PLUS WHITENING" of the Lucky Teeth Organic Mouth Wash - PLUS WHITENING isn't in this product - it's a separate container, so it's another step in your morning or evening hygiene. I really wish they would improve the seal on the lid of the Whitening because it leaked all inside the packaging. The same leakage occurred with the toothpastes. But still a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Valya Karcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my teeth feel like I have just had a cleaning at the dentist. I only use about 4 drops and swish it around. I love it. It has no harmful chemicals and really tastes good too.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mouthwash because it had the food grade hydrogen peroxide. I've noticed my teeth are getting whiter and whiter. I do coffee and green tea everyday. On my 2nd bottle Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: cautionflag

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Like how it did not taste like listerine but more natural
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Zoltowski

customer_reviews.title: So far very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: So far very pleased with the product. Can't wait to see if my dentist sees a difference. I did order another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L. Loucks

customer_reviews.title: Nice organic mouth wash.
customer_reviews.text: Really does help your breath!!! Haven't noticed any whitening difference, but really notice the fresher breath for longer.
customer_reviews.author: GilbertAK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good and it works. I thought the organic oils listed might be a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Yum for the Gums
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the clean feel, and if it does what it's meant to then we got ourselves a deal! Thanks for the freebie!
customer_reviews.author: P. Jesus

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product! My mouth feels great after using it and I can notice a difference in the whiteness of my teeth. Love that it is natural/organic
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Lococo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable difference as I use this with lucky charcoal toothpaste. It is simply peroxide
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for the amount you get, but works okay.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Shadrick

customer_reviews.title: I love Lucky Teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I love Lucky Teeth! It makes my mouth feel good!
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is smaller than a can of soda. For $12.99. What a rip off
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive for from Hydrogen Peroxide with Oils in it
customer_reviews.text: You could recreate this mouthwash for about 75 cents if you already have the ingredients. It's about 10% Hydrogen Peroxide, a few drops of peppermint and spearmint essential oils, and water. I like the paste even though it doesn't want to stay in it's container and bleeds all over but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash. Way overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Great mouthwash. Decent ingredients, light and pleasant taste/scent. Two stars deducted for value. This bottle is tiny, the capfuls are tiny and it's extremely expensive if you plan on using this daily. There are other 'natural' alternatives out there.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouthwash so much! The ingredients are great and my mouth feels cleaner even the next morning. As a bonus, the label says if you have a sore throats to gargle with it and it's given me instant relief. I would buy it just for that purpose. It's small but lasted me a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaGrown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, and natural
customer_reviews.text: most refreshing mouthwash I've ever tried, plus the bonus of the whitening paste is awesome, love this stuff, WISH THEY OFFERED BIGGER BOTTLES.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best mouthwash I've ever used! My teeth and gums seemed to ache every now and then before using this toothpaste / mouthwash. (I bought both so not sure which one worked best) but, now, my mouth feels healthy and fresh! My teeth are noticeably whiter. I will be a lifetime customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best natural mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing natural mouthwash! No aftertaste, great quality and keeps the teeth and gums healthy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Express

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed feelings about it really actually working knowing it’s organic and all and well I loved it!!!! It works and really leaves your mouth feeling fresh
customer_reviews.author: Juana Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the typical store bought brands
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my mouth very fresh! Way better than the typical store bought brands.
customer_reviews.author: Angela HarrisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: ... your teeth and mouth feel amazing) I use the recommended mouthwash. My mouth feels clean and fresh for ...
customer_reviews.text: After brushing my teeth with Lucky toothpaste (which by the way makes your teeth and mouth feel amazing) I use the recommended mouthwash. My mouth feels clean and fresh for hours, unlike store brands. I like using all natural and it being floride free.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Furl

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think it works pretty well. Natural ingredients are always my first choice. however they get 4 stars for packaging, i wish I'd taken a picture of the bag with a fourth of the mouthwash in it. Someone didn't close the bottle properly and I'm surprised it didn't come with a seal. So much wasted product!
customer_reviews.author: ShortiiDoWop

customer_reviews.title: Fresh mouth, healthy mouth
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil does amazing things for my gums and breath. Aftertaste is great. No alcohol or other scary ingredients All NATURAL in love try it you would love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Eliana

customer_reviews.title: love this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: whitens your teeth! love this mouthwash, I am fine with tasteless! its safer anyhow! love it
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Such a great mouthwash, no burning like many other products out there while leaving you with a very fresh feel. I have been using Lucky Teeth for over a year now. Very happy they are a company focused on quality and natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mouth wash I know that I'm using something natural ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouth wash I know that I'm using something natural that is actually giving nutrition to my teeth and not being so worried about how the chemical that I can find on the regular washes, but still having the same result. My teeth are clean and fresh, Love it!!!!! -Mary
customer_reviews.author: maryluz garces

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I am happy I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Fleming

product_meta.title: Lucky Teeth Organic Food Grade Peroxide MouthWash - Plus WHITENING - Whitens, Refreshes. Food Grade Peroxide + Essential Oils. 12 OZ (1 (12 OZ))
